SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity
